name: Booster Shot
description:
Mark the current weapon for injection with **3** shots, lasting **200** seconds, and boost damage by **5%** for **200** seconds. When using the marked weapon's skill, inject one shot and apply a **20%** damage boost for **20** seconds (removed when switching weapons), with a **240** seconds cooldown on the booster shot.

All shots and effects are removed when removing this relic or switching weapon sets, and the original marked shot effect is removed when re-marking the weapon.
advancements: Deal **20%** more damage when hitting Heavily Wounded targets with a marked weapon
Increase physical damage by **2%** even when not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Fully restores HP when using Booster Shot to mark a weapon (restores **20%** HP in Apex League).
